subject: Career
title: Why Most People Don't Negotiate
description: Learn Why Most People Don't Negotiate in one minute.

hook.text: Only 39% of workers negotiate their salary. The other 61% accept the first offer.

buildup.text: Fear of rejection, gratitude for the offer, and not knowing how â€” these keep people silent.

discovery.text: But 85% of those who do negotiate get something more. The odds are overwhelmingly in your favor.

twist.text: Not negotiating costs an average of $600K over a career due to compounding base differences.

climax.text: The company expects negotiation. A budget range already exists. Your silence just saves them money.

punchline.text: The most expensive word in your career is 'okay.'
